scripts.start: concurrently -n frontend,credential-validator,authn-challenge,upload -c red,green,yellow,cyan 'yarn start:frontend' 'yarn start:backend:credential-validator' 'yarn start:backend:authn-challenge' 'yarn start:backend:upload'
scripts.start:backend:authn-challenge: yarn workspace @chealt/authn-challenge-worker run wrangler dev --env dev
scripts.start:backend:credential-validator: yarn workspace @chealt/authn-credential-validator-worker run wrangler dev --env dev
scripts.start:backend:upload: yarn workspace @chealt/upload-worker run wrangler dev --env dev
